scripts.start: npm install && npm run build && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: npm run start:client & npm run start:serv
scripts.start:prod: npm install && npm run build && npm run start:client:prod && npm run start:serv:prod
scripts.install: npm run install:client && npm run install:serv
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:serv
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:serv
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start:serv: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start:client:prod: cd client && npm run start:prod && cd ..
scripts.start:serv:prod: cd server && npm run start:prod && cd ..
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:serv: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:serv: cd server && npm run test && cd ..
